name: SheeBall
description:
Get ready for a lot of fun.

A air hockey like game with powers!
Master the ball to be the best player of the world.

Play Online or Offline!

____________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

  •  [ENTER] to open chat in game

Player 1

  •  [WASD] to move
  • [Double tap] to dash

Player 2

  • [Arrows] to move
  • [Double tap] to dash
